text: It's very easy to get lost into this game's ambient soundtrack. I'll say it again: We need a new Ecco video game, it has never been replaced and with today's graphics I can only imagine what we could get. Sega, let me be a dolphin again.
author: SupraDarky

text: I wouldn't mind if they made it kinda like journey or Abzu
author: crosby7785

text: I know this is an old post, but I was shuffling through the playlists and this came up. The closest thing I've experienced to Ecco is The Undergarden. Kind of a similar vibe where the focus is on exploration with some minor puzzle-solving while going through a surreal, underwater environment with a really ambient soundtrack.
